overview: Marcos, a prosthetic creator with a traumatic past, finds a corpse in his laboratory. While deciding what to do with the corpse he will have to juggle his strange family life, a zombie movie, the possibility of new love and creating the perfect prosthesis for a very special client.
tagline: 11 wigs, 7 ants, 1 corpse and lots of missing pieces
title: Prótesis
